content: this is a mock chainmail coif that i created for a stage production of spamalot it was worn successfully by both children and adults using this same pattern though adjusting the number of row for the face opening can further fit this to an individual s preferences if needed i found that the less expensive the yarn the better the chainmail looked as the pattern stood out more with stiffer yarn i was able to get roughly four coifs out of each one pound skein this is the first pattern i ve tried to capture for others and i hope it s legible please don t hesitate to give me feedback
